title: Rads error
body:
Hi
since the last 6.9 patch i can't open the league client whenever i staart the game it gets stuck on the league of legends logo then after 1 -5 mins it gives me the 
rads error could not connect to the http server
it's been almost 24hours and it's still like that and i posted my problem on the euw boards but no one bothered to help
ps: when i tried using a proxy the game loaded fine so do you think the problem is from my ISP ?

replies.body:
No worries, we won't assume your account is shared just from using a VPN, though we may not be able to assist with any connectivity issues that may result from the VPN.

As to resolving the issue without using a VPN, I'd recommend looking at our [Connection Troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) (most likely the part about configuring your DNS) as a first step.  Helps rule out some of the common causes.  Lemme know if this helps :D

If it's since the 6.9 patch , lot of people got same issue and the probleme is that your network can't resolve the  "l3cdn.riotgames.com" 

You can solve that by using a proxy / vpn client just to get into login screen than desactivate it.

Cheers
